Question 1:
```{r, echo=TRUE, eval=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)

newbillboard <- billboard %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = starts_with("wk"),
    names_to = "week",
    values_to = "rank",
    values_drop_na = TRUE
  ) %>%
  mutate(week = parse_number(week))

newbillboard

ggplot(newbillboard, 
       aes(y = rank, x = week, group = track)) +
  geom_line()
```
